name: printed wiring board production, mounted mainboard, mobile device, double-sided, Pb free | printed wiring board, mounted mainboard, mobile device, double-sided, Pb free | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25127/documentation

This activity represents the production of 1kg of printed wiring board (PWB) for use in mobile devices. It contains the mounting(soldering) of components on the PWB. Production of the components are included through the respective datasets. kg was chosen as a unit for the dataset to be scalable. The board is populated with various components (RAM, solid state memory, processing units, transistors, capacitors, diodes, varistors). Both sides of the PWB are populated. The values of the dataset stem from an LCA on the Fairphone 1 and are condensed from three datasets: "Phone PCB Production", "Phone Capacitor, Diode, Varistors & Transistor Production" and "Phone Integrated Circuit Production".;Source: Güvendik, M. (2014). From smartphone to futurephone: assessing the environmental impacts of different circular economy scenarios of a smartphone using LCA.

From reception of materials and auxiliares at the factory gate. 

The activity includes the materials, processes and energy use (included through "mounting, surface mount technology, Pb-free solder")  for the production of a printed wiring board, mainboard used in mobile phones. Data on factory, disposal and packaging are not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data for composition are from 2014 but represent current technology.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average electronic device.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Literature source points to manufacturing in China. The dataset includes the process of soldering the components to the printed wiring board with "mounting, surface mount technology, Pb-free solder".
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data from Güvendik, 2014 was scaled by mass to fit the reference product of 1kg.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: In the study (Güvendik, 2014), the printed wiring boards were dismanteled and the components identified and weighed.
